name: Martin Denny
description: '''Martin Denny''' (April 10, 1911 â€“ March 2, 2005) was an American pianist, composer, and arranger. Known as the "father of [[exotica]]," he was a multi-instrumentalist and could play a number of [[percussion instrument]]s. In a long career that saw him performing up to 3 weeks prior to his death, he toured the world popularizing his brand of [[lounge music]] which included exotic percussion, imaginative rearrangements of popular songs, and original songs that celebrated [[Tiki culture]].
